Republic Wireless Motorola E Giveaway! (x2)

in Giveaways by J. Money / on October 22, 2014 June 17, 2017 / with (670) Comments Share Facebook Twitter Pinterest Email

What up what up frugal gangsters! My new favorite wireless carrier just released their latest (cheap-as-hell) smart phone, and because they think budgets are sexy too they’re shipping me two to give away to y’all today :) Along with 3 months of free service!

(How’s that for frugal?)

I know I’ve been mentioning Republic Wireless a lot over the months, but that really is only because I feel like I’ve stumbled across a gem here and I want to make sure y’all know about them too. If you’re happy with your own carrier and/or are annoyed with these updates, here are two other giveaways I’m running on my other sites you may find more suitable ;)

  1. A brand new 3/4 oz Silver Canadian Grey Wolf coin
  2. A kick-ass Tuft & Needle mattress

Or, better yet, try and win one of these for a friend or loved one! So *they* can try and convince you to move over after they rave about it, haha… j/k. (kind of)

Here’s a reminder of why I’m obsessed w/ Republic Wireless

  • No contracts
  • Cheap as balls rate plans ($5-$40/mo max)
  • Decent choices of smartphones
  • You can save $100+ if you’re coming from the iPhone like we were.

The only downsides are you’d have to break our contract you’re currently with to switch (possibly costing you money) and you have to buy the phone outright from Republic Wireless. Which makes their latest phone we’re giving away today even better as it’s only $99!

(Fyi, I have noticed a few dropped calls here and there and a little wonky connection at times (it runs mainly over wifi and the Sprint network) but we’re two months in so far and I don’t plan on switching back. It’s not for everyone, but I’m done giving away an extra $100+ to other carriers for nothing.)

Here are some facts on the new Moto E

  • It’s only $99
  • It’s a smartphone.
  • Has 3G
  • 4GB Internal Memory
  • Up to 32GB of expandable memory with micro SD card
  • Android™ KitKat® 4.4.4
  • 5MP Fixed Focus Camera
  • 4.3″ Edge-to-Edge HD Display

I’m not a techie so can’t add much more than that (and I haven’t personally tested this one out), but here’s a 2 min video on it that shares more if you’re interested. To me most smartphones do the same stuff: call, email, apps, etc ;) Here’s their website with more info too: Moto E

 

Like it? Want to own it?

I’ve got two of these bad boys to give out this week, and each comes with 3 months of free service which is an additional $75 value. You have two ways to enter:

  1. Sign up to my newsletter (where you’ll get future blog posts emailed to you)
  2. Tell us who you’d give the phone to, and why (you can choose yourself, of course :))

Drop a comment below with your answer/heads up and you’ll be automatically entered to win. We’ll run the giveaway for a week, and then randomly pick a winner shortly there after. (Open to U.S. only)

Good luck! And thanks for reading my blog :)

***GIVEAWAY NOW OVER*** The two lucky winners of the phone and service are…

  1. Crystal Resendiz
  2. Yvette (commenter #463)

Congrats guys! And thanks for participating everyone :) For those who didn’t win, fortunately the phone and service isn’t that expensive so def. consider giving Republic Wireless a shot.

——–
PS: Don’t forget about the other giveaways too: Silver coin and Mattress – they both end this week.
